content:
Russian invaders continue to fire the border areas of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. In total, 51 shelling (291 explosions) from different types of weapons were charged during the day.

About thisinformsOperational Command "North".

Three communities of Chernihiv region were under enemy shelling.

Snovsk community:

  • Jeline-3 shelling: 7 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 10 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Kuts - 2 shelling: 16 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Gorodnyansk community:

  • Senkivka - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Semeniv community:

  • Progress - 4 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Gramia - 19 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Leoniivka - 10 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Sergiyevske - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Gramyach-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron; 5 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.

Four districts of Sumy region fired the enemy for the past day.

Sumy District:

  • Belovods - 9 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Basivka - 2 shellings: 4 explosions, probably swept out of UAV.
  • Old clips - 8 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Kindrativka - 2 shelling: 19 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Pavlovka - 2 shelling: 29 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Volfine - 4 explosions, probably barrel artillery; 15 explosions, probably AGS.
  • Miropil - 4 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Miropillya-2 shelling: 3 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 6 explosions, probably become artillery; 5 explosions, probably 120 mm mortar; 1 explosion, probably discharge from UAV.
  • Hawk - 5 explosions, probably become artillery; 10 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Steps - 2 shelling: 14 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Cover - 2 explosions, probably discharge of UAV SVP.
  • Slavgorod - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Okhtyr District:

  • Away - 1 explosion, probably UAV type "lancet".
  • Popivka - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Oleksandrivka - 12 explosions, probably RSZV; 2 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.

Konotop District:

  • Boyar-leather-3 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Circle - 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Shostka district:

  • Lyubakhov - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Progress - 2 shelling: 9 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Middle-building-2 shelling: 2 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 6 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Old - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 9 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Schaligyne - 5 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Bobilivka - 6 explosions, probably at the helicopter.

Information on the destruction, dead or injured among the local population is specified.

Recall at night the Russiansattacked thermal and hydroelectric power plants in several regions of Ukraine.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of hostile attacks in Kherson regionDiedMan, 8 more are injured.
title: Enemy shelling of the border of Chernihiv and Sumy region: a day - 291 explosions
description: About it reports the operational command "North". Three communities of Chernihiv region ...
